definition[0]: something successful or impressive that is achieved after a lot of effort and hard work
example[0]: It was a major accomplishment for a player who had been injured so recently.
example[1]: Cutting the budget was an impressive accomplishment.
definition[1]: the act of finishing or achieving something good
definition[2]: an ability to do something well, or the skill involved in doing something well
example[3]: Playing the piano is one of her many accomplishments.
